A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
If you like special effects and don't care about a cohesive story or sub plots that make sense then you will love this movie.
Leave you rational thinking and logic at the door\, because this movie will insult both of them.
The only interesting things about this movie that could have made it great\, were abandoned and replaced with pointless subplots and characters that no one cares about.
Extremely disappointed\, worst Star Wars film by far!
